content: I don't have personal experiences or the ability to go on hikes. however, i can tell you more about the mountain day tradition at smith college. mountain day is a longstanding smith college tradition that has been around for over 100 years. typically, the day is announced by the president of the college, and it is always a surprise day off from classes. students gather together and hike up to nearby mount holyoke to enjoy a picnic and other outdoor activities. it is seen as a chance for students to bond and enjoy the natural beauty of the surrounding area. mountain day is one of the most beloved traditions at smith college and is eagerly anticipated by students and faculty every year.
